name: Inform
flavor: Greatly improved tutoring of another creature.

purposeDescriptions.low: learning accelerating influence for a specific skill. The skill is chosen by the caster.
purposeDescriptions.mid: mastery accelerating influence for a specific skill. The skill is chosen by and must already be mastered by the caster.
purposeDescriptions.high: learning accelerating influence for almost all skills of the caster.
purposeDescriptions.invLow: skill draining influence for a specific skill. The skill must already be mastered by the caster.
purposeDescriptions.invMid: knowledge draining influence for a specific skill.

effects.invHigh: Dazed, Distracted next turn, Stunned two turns from now
